argument.name: fill_color
argument.description: Optional. Default = System defined. The fill color of the selection box.

argument.name: box_color
argument.description: Optional. Default = System defined. The border color of the selection box.

page.description: Displays menus using Office XP style
page.discussion: The A5_XP_STYLE_MENU() function causes Alpha Anywhere to display menus in the style of Windows XP. Limitations: Desktop applications only.
